titles.title: Cyber Deterrence and Response Act of 2025
Cyber Deterrence and Response Act of 2025
To impose sanctions with respect to designated critical cyber threat actors, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Oversight and Government Reform, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
